declare.name: HttpsServer

detail: https 服务器对象是将 SslServer 和 HttpHandler 组合封装的对象，方便快速搭建服务器，逻辑上相当于：
var svr = new net.SslServer(crt, key, addr, port, new http.Handler(function(req){
var svr = new http.HttpsServer(crt, key, 443, function(req){

members.name: HttpsServer

doc.descript: HttpsServer 构造函数，在所有本机地址侦听

params.name: port
params.descript: 指定 http 服务器侦听端口

params.descript: 指定 http 服务器侦听地址，为 "" 则在本机所有地址侦听
